head.title: Lisa Johannessen and Robert Hoak Jr.

hedline.hl1: Lisa Johannessen and Robert Hoak Jr.

block.p: Elizabeth Ann Johannessen, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John E. Johannessen of Grantham, N.H., was married yesterday to Robert Paul Hoak Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Hoak of Miami. The Rev. Richard Ringenwald performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Manchester, Vt.

Elizabeth Ann Johannessen, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. John E. Johannessen of Grantham, N.H., was married yesterday to Robert Paul Hoak Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Hoak of Miami. The Rev. Richard Ringenwald performed the ceremony at the First Congregational Church in Manchester, Vt.

Mrs. Hoak, who is known as Lisa, is an account manager in New York in the fashion apparel division of Milliken & Company, a textile manufacturer. She graduated from Skidmore College. Mr. Hoak is an executive campaign director with Community Counseling Service, fund-raising consultants in New York. He graduated from the University of Rochester.
